languages.text: "Беспокоит — это мягко сказано. Ты словно мутировал в нечто совершенно чуждое".
"'Trouble' is putting it mildly. It is as though you had mutated into something utterly strange."
languages.original_text: "Беспокоит — это мягко сказано. Ты словно мутировал в нечто совершенно чуждое".

traits.locale_text: "'Trouble' is putting it mildly. It is as though you had mutated into something utterly strange."
"'Trouble' is putting it mildly. It is as though you had mutated into something utterly strange."

"'Trouble' is putting it mildly. It is as though you had mutated into something utterly strange."

languages.text: 「『気がかり』なんて生ぬるい言い方だ。まるで君が、全く見知らぬ異質な存在に変わってしまったかのようだった」
languages.original_text: "'Trouble' is putting it mildly. It is as though you had mutated into something utterly strange."

traits.locale_text: 「『気がかり』なんて生ぬるい言い方だ。まるで君が、全く見知らぬ異質な存在に変わってしまったかのようだった」

languages.text: "'Beunruhigt' ist noch milde ausgedrückt. Es kommt mir vor, als wärt Ihr zu etwas völlig Merkwürdigem mutiert."
languages.original_text: "'Trouble' is putting it mildly. It is as though you had mutated into something utterly strange."

traits.locale_text: "'Beunruhigt' ist noch milde ausgedrückt. Es kommt mir vor, als wärt Ihr zu etwas völlig Merkwürdigem mutiert."

languages.text: « "Déplaire" est un euphémisme. C'est comme si vous aviez muté pour devenir une créature étrange. »
languages.original_text: "'Trouble' is putting it mildly. It is as though you had mutated into something utterly strange."

traits.locale_text: « "Déplaire" est un euphémisme. C'est comme si vous aviez muté pour devenir une créature étrange. »

languages.text: «"Preocuparme" es quedarse corto. Parece como si se hubiese transmutado en algo completamente inexplicable».
languages.original_text: "'Trouble' is putting it mildly. It is as though you had mutated into something utterly strange."

traits.locale_text: «"Preocuparme" es quedarse corto. Parece como si se hubiese transmutado en algo completamente inexplicable».

languages.text: “‘麻烦’这个词恐怕太委婉了，我感觉你从里到外都变成了个怪家伙。”
languages.original_text: "'Trouble' is putting it mildly. It is as though you had mutated into something utterly strange."

traits.locale_text: “‘麻烦’这个词恐怕太委婉了，我感觉你从里到外都变成了个怪家伙。”

languages.text: "Rahatsızlık hafif kalır. Dönüştüğün şeyi adlandıramıyorum bile."
languages.original_text: "'Trouble' is putting it mildly. It is as though you had mutated into something utterly strange."

traits.locale_text: "Rahatsızlık hafif kalır. Dönüştüğün şeyi adlandıramıyorum bile."
